title: Gitadora Skill Viewer - Share your GITADORA skill list

intro.title: Introdution
intro.desc: A web site which uses bookmarklet to fetch and store skill data from GITADORA official site, to share with other players.

info.title: Notice
info.content:
• Add support for GITADORA EXCHAIN. Please update script(You can find it in 'How to use' section).
  • Add popular song ranking pages.

step1.imgDesc1: The bookmark name doesn't matter. Put whatever you like.
step1.imgDesc2: Paste the script on the URL input

step2.desc: 2.Log in to GITADORA official site, and click the added bookmark
step2.imgDesc1: Make sure you are on Konami official site
step2.imgDesc2: After login, click the bookmark you just added

step3.desc: 3.Wait for 5 to 10 seconds. It will jump to your skill page after finishing uploading. Mark this URL so as to share your skill data with other players.
step3.imgDesc1:
This url can be accessed by anyone.
Share it with others!

step1.desc: 1.Click the button <このスキル表を永久に保存したい!> on the left bottom, and click OK（Sorry it's Japanese(´・ω・｀) Please ignore it.）

step2.desc: 2.After the skill data is saved, it is redirected to another page. The skill data on this page will be kept permanently.
step2.imgDesc1: The skill data on this url won't be overwritten.

desc.title: Readme
desc.1st: 1.Uploading skill data will overwrite old data. Please use Save skill data（take snapshot） function if you want to save your old skill data
desc.2nd: 2.It's not hard to upload faked skill data to gsv.fun if someone wants. So gsv.fun can not guarantee the authenticity of skill data here, and also it can not guarantee that your uploaded skill data won't be falsified by others, unless you saved your data.
desc.3rd: 3.Different with the commonly used skill simulator, on this web site a user can not change his uploaded skill data.

voice.title: Feedback
voice.desc1: If you have any suggestions and comments, feel free to connect me from my blog :)
